KUMKM Kota Bandung Luncurkan Aplikasi ' Go Coop '
01 Nov 2019, 18:20 by Atep Burhanudin


KUMKM Kota Bandung Luncurkan Aplikasi ' Go Coop '

KBRN,Bandung; Pemerintah Kota Bandung (Pemkot) meluncurkan aplikasi gime berbasis edukasi yakni Go Coop di Kantor Dinas Perpustakaan dan Kearsipan Jawa Barat, Jalan Kawaluyaan Kota Bandung, Jumat (1/11/2019). Gim tersebut pun telah dapat diunggah di PlayStore.Kepala Dinas Koperasi Usaha Mikro Kecil dan Menengah (KUMKM) kota Bandung Atet Dedi Handiman mengungkapkan, tujuan dibuatnya Go Coop yaitu meningkatkan pengetahuan tentang koperasi sekaligus cara untuk promosi dunia koperasi terhadap anak-anak. “Pengenalan koperasi perlu dilakukan sejak dini agar rasa ingin berkoperasi berkembang seiring dengan berkembanganya pemikiran. Sehingga diharapkan akan muncul ide-ide baru untuk mengembangkan koperasi,” ucap Atet.Di utarakan Atet, game tersebut juga dapat mengembangkan koginitif anak-anak. Karena mereka akan memperoleh informasi dari permainan. Lalu menirukan aktivitas dari permainan tersebut.Sementara itu di tempat yang sama, Kepala Dinas Pendidikan Kota Bandung, Hikmat Ginanjar mendukung hadirnya aplikasi berbasis edukasi tersebut. Pasalnya, dengan media digital, diyakini mampu mengasah kemampuan anak-anak dalam memahami koperasi. "Meski masih di usia anak-anak, namun mereka harus mengenal koperasi. Seperti manfaat dan kegunaannya sehingga mampu menambahkan pengetahuan," kata Hikmat. Sedangkan Sekretaris Deputi Bidang Kelembagaan Kementerian Koperasi dan UKM RI, Ahmad Zabani juga menyambut baik peluncuran aplikasi tersebut. Dengan menggunakan teknologi digital, mampu mempermudah anak-anak khususnya murid SD dan SMP untuk memahami koperasi. "Kita dukung inovasi seperti ini. Sehingga anak sekolah lebih paham mengenai koperasi," imbuhnya.

KUMKM Bandung City Launches 'Go Coop' Application
Nov 01 2019, 18:20 by Atep Burhanudin


KUMKM Bandung City Launches 'Go Coop' Application

KBRN, Bandung; The Bandung City Government (Pemkot) launched an educational-based gime application namely Go Coop at the West Java Library and Archives Office, Jalan Kawaluyaan, Bandung City, Friday (11/01/2019). The game can also be uploaded on PlayStore. Head of the Department of Cooperatives for Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises (KUMKM) in the city of Bandung, Atet Dedi Handiman, revealed that the goal of Go Coop is to increase knowledge about cooperatives as well as ways to promote the world of cooperatives for children. "The introduction of cooperatives needs to be done early so that a sense of cooperation develops along with the development of thought. So hopefully new ideas will emerge to develop cooperatives, "said Atet. In utter Atet, the game can also develop children's cognitive skills. Because they will get information from the game. Then imitating the activities of the game. Meanwhile in the same place, Head of the Bandung City Education Agency, Hikmat Ginanjar supported the presence of the educational-based application. The reason is, with digital media, it is believed to be able to hone children's abilities in understanding cooperatives. "Even though they are still in the age of children, but they must know cooperatives. Such as the benefits and uses so that they can add knowledge," said Hikmat. While the Deputy Secretary for Institutional Affairs of the Indonesian Ministry of Cooperatives and SMEs, Ahmad Zabani also welcomed the launch of the application. By using digital technology, it is able to make it easier for children especially elementary and junior high school students to understand cooperatives. "We support innovations like this. So that school children understand more about cooperatives," he added.
